title: Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily in Maputo by Age Group

gold: The graph details the amount of time spent on social media daily by residents of maputo . \\n The graph is broken down by age group showing average number of minutes spent per group . Ages 45 - 54 showed the highest daily usage averaging 150 minutes , while the 35 - 44 age group showed the least , averaging just over 70 minutes .
